benchmark_details.name: CaseHOLD (Case Holdings On Legal Decisions)
benchmark_details.overview: CaseHOLD is a new dataset comprised of over 53,000 multiple choice questions designed to identify the relevant holding of a cited case, which is a fundamental task for lawyers. This dataset addresses the difficulty of existing legal NLP tasks and presents significant challenges from an NLP perspective.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a benchmark for a fundamental legal task, improving challenges in identifying legal holdings and informing on when domain pretraining is beneficial.

data.source: Harvard Law Library case law corpus

methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better model performance in selecting the correct legal holding.
